analyzed: lus ni lus kyis stong /
translated: The body is empty of the body.

original: yid ni yid kyis stong /
analyzed: yid ni yid kyis stong /
translated: The mind is empty of the mind.

original: gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /
analyzed: gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /
translated: Form is empty of form.

original: sgra ni sgras stong /🔽dri ni dris stong /🔽ro ni ros stong /
analyzed: sgra ni sgras stong / dri ni dris stong / ro ni ros stong /
translated: Sound is empty of sound.🔽Smell is empty of smell.🔽Taste is empty of taste.

original: reg ni reg gis stong /
analyzed: reg ni reg gis stong /
translated: Touch is empty of touch.

original: chos ni chos kyis stong /
analyzed: chos ni chos kyis stong /
translated: Phenomena are empty of phenomena.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong /
translated: The eye consciousness is empty of the eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong /🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong / sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong /
translated: The ear consciousness is empty of the ear consciousness.🔽The nose consciousness is empty of the nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pas stong /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pas stong /
translated: The tongue consciousness is empty of the tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong /
translated: Body consciousness is empty of body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong /
translated: Mind consciousness is empty of mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong /
translated: Eye contact is empty of eye contact.🔽Ear contact is empty of ear contact.🔽Nose contact is empty of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong /
translated: Tongue contact is empty of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa @318b ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa @318b ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong /
translated: Body contact is empty of body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong /🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong /
translated: Mind contact is empty of mind contact.🔽Feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is empty of feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong /
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact is empty of feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of the union of nose and contact is empty of the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of nose and contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of the union of tongue and contact is empty of the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of tongue and contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of the union of body and contact is empty of the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of body and contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of the union of mind and contact is empty of the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of mind and contact.

original: sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong /
analyzed: sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong /
translated: The earth element is empty of the earth element.

original: chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong /
analyzed: chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong /
translated: The water element is empty of the water element.

original: me'i khams ni me'i khams kyis stong /🔽rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong /
analyzed: me'i khams ni me'i khams kyis stong / rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong /
translated: The fire element is empty of the fire element.🔽The wind element is empty of the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong /
translated: The space element is empty of the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong /
translated: The consciousness element is empty of the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong /
analyzed: ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong /
translated: Ignorance is empty of ignorance.

original: 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong /
analyzed: 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong /
translated: Formation is empty of formation.

original: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong /
translated: Consciousness is empty of consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs ni ming dang gzugs kyis stong /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs ni ming dang gzugs kyis stong /
translated: Name and form are empty of name and form.

original: skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis stong /
analyzed: skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis stong /
translated: The six sense sources are empty of the six sense sources.

original: reg pa ni reg pas stong /
analyzed: reg pa ni reg pas stong /
translated: Contact is empty of contact.

original: tshor ba ni tshor bas stong /🔽sred pa ni sred pas stong /
analyzed: tshor ba ni tshor bas stong / sred pa ni sred pas stong /
translated: Sensation is empty of sensation.🔽Craving is empty of craving.

original: len pa ni len pas stong /
analyzed: len pa ni len pas stong /
translated: Clinging is empty of clinging.

original: @319a *// srid pa ni srid pas stong /
analyzed: @319a *// srid pa ni srid pas stong /
translated: Becoming is empty of becoming.

original: skye ba ni skye bas stong /
analyzed: skye ba ni skye bas stong /
translated: Birth is empty of birth.

original: rga shi ni rga shis stong /
analyzed: rga shi ni rga shis stong /
translated: Aging and death are empty of aging and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong /
translated: The perfection of generosity is empty of the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong /
translated: The perfection of ethical discipline is empty of the perfection of ethical discipline.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong /
translated: The perfection of patience is empty of the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par stong /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par stong /
translated: The perfection of perseverance is empty of the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong /
translated: The perfection of concentration is empty of the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong /🔽nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong /🔽phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong / nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is empty of the perfection of wisdom.🔽Inner emptiness is empty of inner emptiness.🔽Outer emptiness is empty of outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong /
translated: Inner and outer emptiness is empty of inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong /
translated: Emptiness of emptiness is empty of emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong /
translated: Great emptiness is empty of great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /
translated: The emptiness of ultimate reality is empty of the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong /
translated: The emptiness of conditioned phenomena is empty of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong /
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is empty of the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /
translated: The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is empty of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /
translated: The emptiness of what is not to be discarded is empty of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.🔽The emptiness of nature is empty of the emptiness of nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis @319b stong; chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis @319b stong; chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong /
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is empty of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /
translated: The emptiness of its own mark is empty of the emptiness of its own mark.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is empty of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /
translated: The emptiness of non-things is empty of the emptiness of non-things.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong /
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is empty of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong /
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is empty of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong /
translated: The applications of mindfulness are empty of the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong /
translated: The right efforts are empty of the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong /
translated: The legs of miraculous power are empty of the legs of miraculous power.

original: dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong /
analyzed: dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong /
translated: The faculties are empty of the faculties.

original: stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong /
analyzed: stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong /
translated: The powers are empty of the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong /
translated: The branches of enlightenment are empty of the branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong /
translated: The noble eightfold path is empty of the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong /
translated: The truths are empty of the truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong /🔽tshad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa rnams kyis stong /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong / tshad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa rnams kyis stong /
translated: The meditative concentrations are empty of the meditative concentrations.🔽The immeasurable aspirations are empty of the immeasurable aspirations.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong /
translated: The formless absorptions are empty of the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong /
translated: The liberations are empty of the liberations.

original: mthar @320a *// gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong /
analyzed: mthar @320a *// gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong /
translated: The serial absorptions are empty of the serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong /
translated: The emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation are empty of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong /
translated: The higher perceptions are empty of the higher perceptions.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong /
translated: The meditative stabilities are empty of the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong /
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways are empty of the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong /
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas are empty of the powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong /
translated: the fearlessnesses are empty of the fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong /🔽byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen pos stong /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong / byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen pos stong /
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges are empty of the detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽great love is empty of great love,

original: snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong /
analyzed: snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong /
translated: great compassion is empty of great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong /🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong /🔽lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong /
translated: the distinct attributes of a buddha are empty of the distinct attributes of a buddha,🔽the result of stream enterer is empty of the result of stream enterer,🔽the result of once-returner is empty of the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong /
translated: the result of non-returner is empty of the result of non-returner,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong /
translated: the state of an arhat is empty of the state of an arhat,

original: rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyis stong /
analyzed: rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyis stong /
translated: a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is empty of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: @320b lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: @320b lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong /
translated: the knowledge of path aspects is empty of the knowledge of path aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is empty of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: Subhūti, this is the sameness of bodhisattva great beings.

original: de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: Abiding in it, bodhisattva great beings fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ” “Lord,

original: ci lags / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na /
analyzed: ci lags / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na /
translated: if bodhisattva great beings train in order to eliminate form,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
translated: do they train in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na /
analyzed: gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na /
translated: “If one practices in order to be free from attachment to form,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
translated: is one training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: gzugs 'gag par bgyi bar slad du slob na /
analyzed: gzugs 'gag par bgyi bar slad du slob na /
translated: “If one practices in order to stop form,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
translated: is one training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: gzugs mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na /
analyzed: gzugs mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na /
translated: “If one practices in order to prevent form from arising,
